item.title: DABDA
item.description: from https://twitter.com/cryptoismyjam/status/1548114053247012865 1/ The future of our funds is in limbo. The company that told us “Banks are Not Your Friends” & “Unbank Yourself” violated our trust in a most egregious manner. We are sad. Angry. Brokenhearted. item.title: The Webb Space Telescope Will Rewrite Cosmic History. If It Works.
item.description: 《韦伯天文望远镜将会改写宇宙历史，如果它能正常工作的话》 作者：娜塔莉·沃尔乔弗 和菜头整理,谷歌翻译: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/YSEmlentq3pwhLsNIfT8Dw 原文地址: https://www.quantamagazine.org/why-nasas-james-webb-space-telescope-matters-so-much-20211203 回首宇宙的幼年，见证第一颗

item.title: Advice for lack of discipline
item.description: “If you lack discipline, open this” Psychology Thread Choose a Goal Begin by choosing just one goal that you want to focus on to develop your self-discipline. Remember, starting small is the best way to start developing your self-discipline. Nutrition, Sleep and Exercise Are Key If you are trying to improve your self discipline and you’re not getting enough sleep, healthy food and exercise, you’re fighting an uphill battle. If

item.title: Advice from ArtOfLife_
item.description: “Overthinkers”, open this: • You’re loved, someone out there loves you more than you think. • Your anxiety will tell you the worst case scenario. It’s a damn liar! • You mean so much to your friends and family, they may not say it as often but they really do love you. • You’ve already survived things you didn
